block-definition.comment: Catch errors. Runs the first script. If it succeeds, nothing else happens. But if it has an error (something that would otherwise result in a red halo around the block), then the second script is run, with the text of the error message that would have been shown in the variable ERROR.
block-definition.translations: pt:tenta executar _ e, em caso de erro _ , executa _ ca:prova de forma segura _ i si _ _

custom-block.s: 🥕 把项目 URL 设定为 %txt

block-definition.comment: 是否与 MicroBlocks 设备建立了连接?
断开与 MicroBlocks 设备的连接

scripts.comment: 当前的microblocks固件, 最多并行处理2个任务 blocking_call (阻塞) 和 call (非阻塞) 使用广播机制, 构建生产者/消费者模式, 似乎可以任意扩展并行处理消息的能力
当前的microblocks固件, 最多并行处理2个任务 blocking_call (阻塞) 和 call (非阻塞)
